privacygate: This Privacy Policy explains how Coral Wealth Investment LLC ("Company", "we", "us", or "our") and its application platform, CWI, collect, use, share, and protect your information. By using our mobile application, website, or related services (collectively, the "Service"), you agree to the terms of this policy.
privacy1: Effective Date: January 24, 2024. Last Updated: May 9, 2025
privacy2: Coral Wealth Investment LLC is a licensed investment platform operating from Dubai Silicon Oasis, UAE. Our mobile platform, CWI , allows investors to explore opportunities, manage accounts, monitor earnings, and interact with support services.
privacy3:
A. Information You Provide to Us:
• Name, email address, phone number, and residential address
• Investment preferences and inquiries
• Login credentials and account setup details
• User-generated content (e.g., messages, support requests)

B. Information Collected Automatically:
• Device and log data (e.g., IP address, OS version, device type)
• App usage statistics and activity
• Location data (if location services are enabled)
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies
privacy4:
We use your data to:
• Create and manage your account on CWI
• Facilitate investment transactions and reporting
• Communicate service updates, newsletters, and offers
• Improve functionality, performance, and security
• Comply with legal, regulatory, and contractual obligations
• Detect and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized use.
privacy5:
We may share your data with:
• Authorized service providers for cloud hosting, analytics, or customer support
• Regulatory authorities when required by law or for compliance
• Affiliated entities under common control or in business partnerships
• Buyers or investors in the event of a corporate merger or acquisition
• With your explicit consent, where necessary

We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy6:
You have the right to:
• Access and correct your personal data
• Request deletion of your data where legally permissible
• Withdraw consent or object to processing
• Manage your marketing preferences
• Request a copy of your data (data portability)

To exercise your rights, contact us at:
https://coraluae.com/contact-us
privacy7: We retain your information as long as your account is active or as needed to: • Fulfill legal or regulatory obligations • Resolve disputes and enforce our agreements • Support your investment history for audit and transparency
privacy8: We implement strong security measures (encryption, firewalls, secure storage) to protect your personal data. However, no system is entirely immune from cyber threats. Users are encouraged to use secure passwords and report any suspicious activity.
privacy9: If you access our services from outside the UAE, please note that your data may be transferred to and stored in jurisdictions with data protection laws that differ from your country. We use contractual safeguards where required.
privacy10: Our services are not intended for users under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we become aware that such data has been collected, we will delete it immediately.
privacy11: Our app and website may link to third-party services (e.g., payment gateways, document verification tools). These are governed by their own privacy policies, and we do not take responsibility for their data practices.
privacy12: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted within the app and/or communicated via notifications. Continued use of the Service after such updates indicates your acceptance of the revised terms.
privacy13:
